channel.title: Comments for page "Prize Wheel"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Prize Wheel"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
You have forgotten to add the prize of Basic Resource for the Village.
I believe it is won on Common, but is a "rare" Common Prize.
Too often I see people trying to use cheats like Billy, etc. to try and win it.
Cheats lessen their chance of winning a Basic Resource, if I am correct.
Please update once you have verified that it is a Common prize on the wheel.
Thank You.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: That message is probably the one from the Black Market Village Upgrade, where if your village contribution goes over 250k for the day, Black Market won't increase it anymore.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I was playing too fast and missed the exact content, but I saw a message "something 250K something". It disappeared on my next click, I will look for it again. I have spent over 250K this season on wheel though. But this was NOT on the click that pushed me over 250K, it was going from 258 to 259K

item.title: discount
item.content:encoded: You are correct, I was not accounting for a discount.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Are you sure that you aren't counting discounts in that? There is an item, upgrades and a team that reduce the price… I have all discounts but the team on right now so it's 160+80 for me right now…

item.title: cost
item.content:encoded:
wiki lists the cost at 250 + 125 per try per day. current cost is 200 + 100 per try per day.
this should be updated (I haven't been playing for a month yet so I can't)
